attributes.action: cancel 2022 alevels and gcses or at least make the tests easier to sit.
attributes.additional_details: It’s unfair that they’ll have to sit the exams when they’ve barely learnt anything for example the current year 10s started their gcses last year but missed out on 6months of learning due to COVID, now they’re missing more learning due to lockdown, they haven’t even sat a mock exam yet.
attributes.background: The government should cancel Gcses and alevel exams in 2022 and reset the system in 2023 as year 10s and year12s have already missed a lot of content crucial for next year.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566760
